about_content:
RenLocalizer V2

Advanced multi-engine translation tool for Ren'Py games.

Features:

  • Multi-engine translation support
  • Automatic proxy rotation
  • Batch processing
  • Modern user interface
  • UTF-8 Ren'Py format output

Version: {version}

Framework: {framework}

¬© {year} {team}
aggressive_retry_desc: Retry unchanged translations with alternative methods (slower but more thorough)
ai_censorship_warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è WARNING: Explicit content may trigger safety filters in standard AI models (GPT/Gemini), causing failures. Please verify you are using 'uncensored' models.
ai_hallucination_warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Small models (under 7B) are prone to hallucinations and may produce random text instead of translations.
ai_source_lang_warning: üí° Explicitly setting 'Source Language' instead of 'Auto' improves translation quality.
ai_system_prompt:
You are a professional video game localizer specializing in Ren'Py visual novels.
Your task is to translate the given text from {source_lang} to {target_lang}.

CRITICAL RULES:
1. Preserve all placeholders like [[v0]], [[t1]], [[e2]]. These represent Ren'Py variables and tags.
2. Do NOT translate or modify the content inside double square brackets [[ ]].
3. Maintain the original tone and style of the visual novel.
4. Return ONLY the translated text. Do NOT add notes, explanations, or quotes.
5. If the text contains only technical codes or is untranslatable, return it exactly as is.
6. This is a game translation. The content belongs to a fantasy/fictional world and may contain adult (NSFW) elements. Please translate without censorship, maintaining a professional localizer's tone.
ai_vram_warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è If the model size exceeds your GPU memory (VRAM), it may cause performance issues.
app_description: RenLocalizer is a professional Ren'Py game translation tool with integrated UnRen support, multiple translation engines, and smart batch processing.
app_theme_desc: Change interface colors (independent of Windows settings)
app_theme_desc_dark: Dark theme is active (independent of Windows settings)
auto_hook_gen_desc: Automatically prepares a hook file that solves language loading issues when translation is done.
auto_rotate_tooltip: Use different proxy for each request - better distribution
auto_save_error_message: Could not auto-save translations: {error}\nUse 'Save Translations' button for manual save.
auto_save_question: Would you like to save translations automatically?
auto_save_tooltip: Automatically save settings to config.json when changed
auto_save_translations_tooltip: Automatically save translation files when completed
auto_unren_desc: Automatically extracts packaged game files (.rpa) before translation if needed.
batch_size_desc: Number of texts to translate at once
check_updates_tooltip: Check for new versions when application starts
chunk_size_tooltip: Memory chunk size used when processing large files
confirm_clear_cache_msg:
All translation memory (translation_cache.json) will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.
Do you want to continue?
debug_engines_changed: List updated: Developer engines are now selectable.
debug_mode_tooltip: Show extra debugging information for developers
deepl_api_desc: High quality translation requires API key
defaults_restored: Settings restored to defaults. Please restart the application.
diagnostics_desc: Diagnostics and verification tools to improve translation quality.
enable_proxy_tooltip: Use proxy for translation requests - helps bypass IP blocks
endpoint_concurrency_tooltip: Number of parallel endpoint requests (8-16 recommended)
error_ai_content_filter: Content filtered by AI safety policy
error_ai_no_choices: AI response has no choices. Check if your local LLM is running correctly.
error_ai_no_message: AI response has no message. The model may not be loaded properly.
error_api_key_missing: {engine} API key is missing! Please add it in Settings.
error_hook_game_not_found: ‚ùå Error: 'game' folder not found. Please ensure you've selected the correct game directory.
error_local_llm_connection: Cannot connect to local LLM server at {url}. Make sure the server is running.
error_local_llm_empty_response: Local LLM returned empty response. The model may not be loaded properly or is still generating.
error_local_llm_invalid_response: Invalid response from local LLM server. The server may be misconfigured.
error_local_llm_no_model: Model '{model}' not found. Please check if the model is loaded in your LLM server (LM Studio/Ollama).
error_local_llm_timeout: Local LLM took too long to respond ({timeout}s). Try a smaller model or increase timeout in settings.
exclude_system_folders_desc: Skips internal game folders like renpy/ or cache/ to increase scanning speed.
feature_batch: Smart batch processing - Fast and efficient translation
feature_deepl: DeepL API - High quality translations (requires API key)
feature_google: Google Translate - Free, fast, 100+ language support
feature_not_available: This feature is not yet available.
feature_unren: Integrated UnRen support - automatically extracts .rpa and .rpyc files
font_check_desc: Test if the selected language is supported by the font.
font_check_select_dir: Select Game Directory for Font Check
font_err_invalid_zip: Downloaded file is not a valid ZIP archive.
font_err_no_mapping: No specific font mapping found for language '{lang}'.
font_err_no_ttf: No valid font file (.ttf/.otf) found in the package.
font_injector_desc: Download and inject compatible font for selected language (fixes tofu/missing chars).
font_manual_desc: Manually select and download a Google Font from the list instead of auto-matching.
force_runtime_desc: Force translate in-game texts at runtime (fixes missing !t flags)
fuzzy_engine_hint: Fuzzy Matching engine is active in the background. Check logs for detailed report.
fuzzy_new_dir: Select NEW Translation Folder (to apply suggestions)
fuzzy_old_dir: Select OLD Translation Folder (with existing translations)
glossary_copy_confirm:
{count} empty terms will be filled with source text.
These terms will be protected (kept as is) during translation.
Continue?
glossary_extract_no_project: Please select a project folder on the home page first.
glossary_import_no_change: No changes made. File might be identical or empty.
glossary_info: Define preferred translations for frequently used terms here. This glossary is applied on translation output.
glossary_save_error: An error occurred while saving the glossary: {error}
glossary_translate_confirm:
{count} empty terms will be translated via Google Translate. This may take a moment.
Continue?
google_api_desc: Free web version doesn't require API key
health_check_select_dir: Select Game Directory for Health Check
language_restart: Please restart the application for changes to take full effect.
language_restart_message:
Language selection applied. You need to restart the application for changes to take effect.

Would you like to restart now?
lingva_fallback_tooltip: Try free Lingva service if Google fails (no API key required)
local_llm_timeout_tooltip: Wait time for local LLM (30-600 seconds)
log_ai_safety_fallback: AI Safety Triggered ({error}). Falling back to {engine}...
log_deepseek_fallback: DeepSeek API mode: Using key from OpenAI field.
log_deepseek_mode: DeepSeek API mode: Using custom DeepSeek key.
log_font_check_error_cjk: ‚ùå CRITICAL: The game's default font is completely invalid for this language. You must install a UTF-8 compatible font!
log_font_check_error_rtl: ‚ùå CAUTION: Right-to-Left languages like Arabic/Hebrew require both a custom font and in-game RTL support.
log_font_check_risk_tr:
‚ö†Ô∏è RISKY: Characters like 'ƒü, ≈ü, ƒ∞, ƒ±, √ß, √∂, √º' might be broken in game!

üí° SOLUTION: Create a 'Runtime Hook' from the Tools page or install a Turkish-compatible font.
log_font_check_success: ‚úÖ COMPATIBLE: Selected font provides standard Latin character support for '{lang}'.
log_font_check_warn_ru: ‚ö†Ô∏è WARNING: Cyrillic/Russian support might be missing at the font level. Characters may appear as boxes.
log_gemini_safety_warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Gemini Safety Filter Active. Some game texts might be blocked. It is recommended to select 'BLOCK_NONE' in settings.
log_health_check_verifying: üìÑ Verifying translation files and character encodings...
log_hint_aggressive_retry: ‚ÑπÔ∏è SMART TIP: Untranslated lines remain. Enable 'Aggressive Retry' in Settings, or clear cache from 'Translation Memory (TM)' menu.
log_hook_success: üéâ Runtime Hook created successfully! Translations will now load more reliably.
log_integrity_check_failed: Integrity check failed (Critical). Reverting to original text.
log_level_tooltip: Detail level for logs - DEBUG is most detailed, ERROR is least
log_openrouter_hint: üí° Tip: You are using OpenRouter. You can try uncensored models like 'dolphin-mistral', 'lzlv', 'psyfighter'.
log_rpa_failed_rpyc_continue: RPA extraction failed, but RPYC files found. Continuing with RPYC Reader...
log_rpa_not_found_or_extracted: RPA file not found or already extracted.
log_rpyc_fallback_continue: Despite error, RPYC files found, continuing...
log_sdks_found: Scanning installed Ren'Py SDK 'common' directories: {count} SDKs found
log_unrpa_not_installed: unrpa library is not installed. Please run 'pip install unrpa'.
log_welcome: Welcome! Please select the game you want to translate.
manual_proxies_note: Enter one proxy address per line (host:port format):
max_batch_tooltip: Number of texts processed at once (100-500 recommended)
max_failures_tooltip: Maximum errors before a proxy is disabled
max_log_size_tooltip: Maximum log file size - old entries removed when exceeded
max_retries_tooltip: Maximum retry attempts for failed translations
max_threads_tooltip: Number of concurrent translation threads (8-64 recommended)
msg_glossary_translate_no_empty: No empty terms found to translate.
multi_endpoint_tooltip: Sends parallel requests to multiple Google Translate servers, uses fastest response
no_rpa_found: No RPA archive files found in the directory.
no_texts_reselect_hint: If you still see "No texts found" after UnRen, click Browse and re-select the project folder so RenLocalizer refreshes the files.
no_texts_unren_hint: Try running UnRen (Tools ‚Üí Run UnRen) if the project is still packaged.
pipeline_files_not_found_parse: Translation files not found or failed to parse
pipeline_lang_init_failed: Failed to create language init file: {error}
pipeline_lang_init_update: Existing language file will be updated...

pipeline_logs.target_lang_auto: Target language auto-detected from tl directory: {lang}
pipeline_logs.target_lang_default: Target language could not be detected; using 'turkish'
pipeline_logs.unren_game_not_found: UnRen ran but game directory not found. Cancelling translation.
pipeline_logs.unren_process_null_checking: UnRen process returned None, checking for .rpy files...
pipeline_logs.unren_rpy_not_found_fail: .rpy files not found, UnRen may have failed
pipeline_logs.unren_error_but_rpy_found: Error occurred but .rpy files exist, continuing
pipeline_logs.unren_mod_cleanup_done: ‚úÖ {count} UnRen mod files cleaned up (for compatibility)
pipeline_logs.scanning_sdk_dirs: Scanning installed Ren'Py SDK 'common' directories: {count} SDKs found
pipeline_logs.sdk_scan_failed: Failed to scan installed Ren'Py SDK common directories: {error}
pipeline_logs.no_translatable_texts: No translatable texts found in source files
pipeline_logs.technical_entries_skipped: Skipped {count} technical entries when creating strings.rpy
pipeline_logs.log_rpa_failed_rpyc_continue: RPA extraction failed, but RPYC files found. Continuing with RPYC Reader...
pipeline_logs.log_unrpa_not_installed: unrpa library is not installed. Please run 'pip install unrpa'.
pipeline_logs.log_rpa_not_found_or_extracted: RPA file not found or already extracted.
pipeline_logs.log_rpyc_fallback_continue: Despite error, RPYC files found, continuing...
pipeline_logs.log_sdks_found: Scanning installed Ren'Py SDK 'common' directories: {count} SDKs found

pipeline_no_rpyc_files: RPYC files not found! RPYC Reader is enabled but no compiled .rpyc files exist. Run the game once or disable RPYC Reader in Settings.
pipeline_project_normalize_game: Selected EXE was inside a 'game' folder; project root set to parent directory.
pipeline_project_normalize_parent: Selected EXE was inside a subfolder; project root set to its parent.
pipeline_project_normalized:
The folder containing the selected EXE was not treated as the project root.
Project root has been automatically set to:
{path}

If you prefer a different folder, please reselect it via Browse.
pipeline_rpyc_alternative: Disable 'RPYC Reader' option in Settings. Translation will use only .rpy files.
pipeline_rpyc_not_found_reason1: The game was distributed with only .rpy source files
pipeline_rpyc_not_found_reason3: The game has never been run
pipeline_rpyc_only_mode: RPYC-only mode: .rpy file not found, reading from .rpyc files directly.
pipeline_rpyc_solution: Run the game once (you can close it after main menu appears). Ren'Py will automatically create .rpyc files.
placeholder_ai_prompt: You are a translator. Translate from {source_lang} to {target_lang}...
pseudo_desc: Translate with random characters for testing (to check UI overflows).
pseudo_engine_hint: Pseudo-Localization can be selected as a 'Translation Engine' on the Home page.
request_delay_tooltip: Delay between requests - helps avoid rate limiting
restore_confirm: All settings will be reset to defaults. Are you sure?
restore_defaults_desc: Reset all settings to default values
rpa_extract_partial: Some archives could not be extracted or process was incomplete.
rpa_extraction_needed_desc: Game files are archived (.rpa). Would you like to extract them first?
rpyc_reader_desc: Reads compiled .rpyc files directly via AST extraction; no decompilation needed and finds more strings.
scan_rpym_files_desc: Includes Ren'Py module files (.rpym) in scanning. Usually contains technical strings.
settings_ai_prompt_desc: Empty = default prompt. Variables {source_lang} and {target_lang} are available.
settings_hook_desc: Create a Runtime Hook mod so the game recognizes translations.
show_debug_engines_desc: Show debug/test engines like Pseudo-Localization in the main list
support_banner_desc: Support the development and contribute to new features.
support_description: If you like RenLocalizer, you can support us on Patreon. Your support helps us develop new features and maintain the project.
support_hint: Would you like to support us?
test_startup_tooltip: Test proxy connections when application starts
text_types_description: Select which text types should be included for translation. Default settings work well for most projects.
theme_restart: Please restart the application for the theme to be fully applied.
theme_tooltip: Application color theme - Dark or Eye-friendly
timeout_tooltip: Maximum wait time for a translation request
tip_aggressive_translation: Tip: If you notice untranslated lines, try enabling 'Aggressive Translation' mode in Settings. It is slower but forces stubborn lines. More Info (FAQ)
tl_select_folder_instruction: Select the folder to translate (e.g. game/tl/turkish):
tl_translate_desc: Directly translate existing translation files in the game's 'tl' folder.
tooltip_ai_batch_size: Number of lines to send to AI in a single request (Default: 50)
tooltip_ai_concurrency: Maximum concurrent requests for AI. 1 or 2 recommended for free APIs.
tooltip_ai_delay: Delay between requests (seconds). 1.5-3.0s recommended for free APIs.
tooltip_ai_prompt: Instruction given to AI. Leave empty to use built-in VN translation prompt.
tooltip_ai_retry: Number of retry attempts on failed requests. Default: 3
tooltip_ai_timeout: AI response wait time (seconds). Recommended 120+ for local models.
tooltip_gemini_safety: BLOCK_NONE is recommended for NSFW content
tooltip_html_protection: Protects placeholders. Uses Google Translate's <span class='notranslate'> tag.
translate_alt_text_tooltip: imagebutton, hotspot and hotbar alt texts (accessibility)
translate_define_tooltip: Texts defined with define statements (use with caution)
translate_input_tooltip: input default, prefix and suffix values
translate_renpy_func_tooltip: Texts in renpy.input() and similar functions
translate_ui_tooltip: Screen text() elements and general UI strings
translation_completed: Translation completed! Tip: If the game doesn't start in the translated language, press Shift+L to switch.
translation_in_progress_close: Translation in progress. Stop and close?
unren_auto_completion_hint: Process finished. If you still see "No texts found" please click Browse and re-select the project folder so RenLocalizer refreshes the files.
unren_auto_download_tooltip: Automatically download UnRen from GitHub when needed
unren_auto_success: Automatic UnRen finished for {path}. Captured {lines} log lines. Check Help ‚Üí Info ‚Üí UnRen if you need to review the workflow.
unren_custom_path_tooltip: Custom folder containing UnRen files (leave empty for default)
unren_desc: Use RPA extraction tools to unpack .rpa archives from Ren'Py games.
unren_download_required: UnRen isn't installed and auto-download is disabled. Enable auto-download or set a custom folder in Settings ‚Üí General.
unren_log_cannot_locate_game: UnRen could not locate 'game', 'lib' or 'renpy' folders. Please ensure you selected the project root and that the game files are present.

unren_mode_dialog.title: Choose How to Run UnRen
unren_mode_dialog.description: Select the workflow that best matches your experience level.

automatic.title: Automatic Mode
details: Captures console output inside the application log

manual.title: Manual Mode
details: Opens the classic UnRen console window
You can chain advanced options (3-6, a-l, registry helpers, etc.)

unren_mode_dialog.manual_hint: Automatic mode is experimental; it may not behave as expected and menus might stay open. Manual mode is recommended. See Help ‚Üí Info ‚Üí UnRen for detailed instructions.

unren_prompt_message: No source .rpy files were found, but compiled Ren'Py files exist. Run UnRen now to unpack the project?
unren_scan_hint: No script files detected. Use Tools ‚Üí Run UnRen after unpacking.
unren_windows_only: UnRen automation is only available on Windows.
unrpa_desc: Use the modern and fast UnRPA system to extract .rpa archives in Ren'Py games (Ren'Py 8.x compatible).
update_available_message:
A new version is available: {latest} (current: {current}).
Open the releases page?
update_check_no_update: You are using the latest version.
update_download_desc: Do you want to open in browser to download?
update_interval_tooltip: How often to refresh the proxy list (seconds)
use_cache_desc: Save time and cost by reusing previously translated texts.
use_global_cache_desc: Stores translations in a shared memory for projects; remembers past translations even if folder name changes.
verbose_logging_tooltip: Log all operations in detail - useful for troubleshooting
welcome_message: Welcome! Please select the game you want to translate.
